txt.en: 'The road's a lonely place. I ought to start talking to myself.'
'Fortunes aren't made in hobbit-holes! At least, that's what my dad always said.'
'Between a Bree-house and a hobbit-hole, I'll take my cozy waggon.'
'Sorry, but I've no goods to sell. This lot is bound for Combe.'
'Honey to Staddle, pipeweed to Combe!  A middle-man's life is simple enough.'
